read_RFdata module¶

exception read_RFdata.MissingDataError¶

Bases: Exception

exception read_RFdata.NotBinaryFileError¶

Bases: Exception

read_RFdata.RF_bars(rf_data, num_beams)¶

Split radio frequency array into an array or arrays of correct size

Parameters:
  • rf_data – imported radio frequency data as a single array of integers
  • num_beams – number of beams
Returns:

rfdata_bars: 2D array of RF data of size (number of beams by number of axial samples)
read_RFdata.read_RF(RF_data_filename, axial_samples, num_beams)¶
Parameters:
  • RF_data_filename – User specified binary file containing RF data
  • axial_samples – # of samples in the axial direction
  • num_beams – number of beams
Returns:

rf_data: imported radio frequency data as a single array of integers
